title: Collaborative Learning Design in Large-Scale Lecture-Based Information Technology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Fundamental Information Technology Concepts and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Online-offline integrated collaborative learning in BYOD environments emphasizing knowledge sharing and community building among practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement collaborative learning strategies with peers to solve information technology project problems
Learners can exchange real-time feedback using online tools (collaboration platforms, discussion forums, etc.) in a PBL environment
Learners can analyze and share practical cases applying advanced information technology knowledge within a learning community
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
